visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object that renders a column chart. The chart should have a title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should display categories 'Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr' with labels styled in blue color and font size of 14px. The y-axis should not have a title but should have labels styled in green color and font size of 12px. The data series should include one series named 'Sales' with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2]. The chart should have a light gray background and a legend positioned at the bottom of the chart. The chart should also have custom colors for the columns: ['#FF5733', '#33FF57', '#3357FF', '#FF33A1'].
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with specific styling and data.
